name: Gremlin Man - Flight Demo
description:
Look out! Here comes the Gremlin Man! Based the original and awesome character by Nick Lutsko. 

Context:

I have no idea how well this will perform on other computers. I have all the settings turned up to maximum. Using Lumen for lighting. 

How to play

Photo Mode:
P / Xbox Start

Gallery Mode:
G / Xbox Select

Jump:
Space / Xbox A

Flight Mode:
Press jump while in the air to enter flight mode. Press jump again to cancel.

Aiming:
Right Click / Xbox LT

Fast Flight
L Shift / Xbox RB

Uses the Cesium Plugin for the city geometry.
